text: Alan Alan (born Alan Rabinowitz; 30 November 1926 \- 4 July 2014) was a British escapologist and magician. He was known for creating the escape from straight jacket stunt. He performed a buried alive trick that almost killed him. He appeared in a number of television magic shows, including The Magic of David Copperfield. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2014 deaths Category:British magicians Category:Entertainers from London
title: Alan Alan
